title: Detective Boys vs. Elderly Detective League

infobox.Title:: Detective Boys vs. Elderly Detective League
infobox.Japanese title:: 少年探偵団VS老人探偵団  (Shōnen Tantei-dan vs Shirubā Tantei-dan)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba

Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi, Genta Kojima  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Hiromichi Kogami as Kiyomasa Kuroda  Kazuhiko Kishino as Eitaro Tokunaga  Ikuo Nishikawa as Mutsuhiko Akasaka  Yu Shimaka as Ginta Oshima  Reiko Suzuki as Yasuko Emoto  Hiroko Nishi as Tae Kano

sections.Situation:
The Detective Boys and Conan met a group called the Elderly Detective League, who are similar to them. The Elderly Detective League said that they saw a thief with blond hair and followed him into a house, where they saw Kiyomasa Kuroda's corpse.

The Elderly Detective League then seemed to have solved the case and said the the blond thief killed Kiyomasa, but Conan is doubting whether that is the truth.

sections.Trivia:
- The book Conan makes a reference to is John Dickson Carr's novel The Emperor's Snuff-Box.
- Kiyomasa Kuroda's car is a dandelion yellow Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution V. The license plate number is 新宿 300, な 16-73 (Shinjuku 300, Na 16-73).
